amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 211, the Hurricane Assistance Replacement Grant Program, from the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-97 to strike section 211, thereby requiring anyone receiving both a grant and a disaster loan to use the grant to repay the disaster loan thereby preventing the government from compensating the same person twice for the same disaster.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 246 (Roll no. 222).
